channel.title: CircleCI on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in CircleCI on Some Title

item.title: Notify the chat of new articles of Qiita Organization to improve learning efficiency of the organization!
item.description: We are promoting the output activity of Qiita articles in-house. It's G-awa. The learning method using output is highly recommended and is highly recommended. However, on the other hand, it is difficult for one person to continue alone, so it is important for the team and organization to support each other. If you are alone, you tend to break your heart. <img src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-b_wxsoyflcs/WZP38JpI0LI/AAAAABGDA/troMJOw1KGUpq7yueRTgIdPc85o_kexXQCLcBGAs/s400/tamashii_nukeru_man.png” →="30%“> →="30%“> //2.bp.blogspot.com/-aIs9YKfGlEk/Vy2v2rXYgjI/AAAAAAAA6b0/PuaALahZfJsIluEeFOKgfgOy43qrc8bBQCLcB/s450/enjin_circle_wakamono.png” width="40%“> I read yesterday’s article and it was very helpful :thumbsup: It’s a great environment for engineers to grow when there is an environment in which they can encourage each other.
